text: (gentle music)
- [Narrator] Game publishers today

primarily distribute their
games through app stores
and third-party channels,

but these often prevent direct
communication with players.

Publishers can create a
direct-to-player channel
by streaming their games,

but that requires building
their own infrastructure,

which is costly and
technically challenging.

Amazon GameLift Streams
solves this, empowering you

to deliver real-time game
streaming experiences

at 1080p resolution and
60 frames per second.
Players can now game

on any browser-enabled
device in real time,

turning all kinds of screens
into powerful gaming machines.

Using AWS technology,
Amazon GameLift Streams
offers instant play without needing
to download any large files,
and helps you create instant-on demos,
securely distribute test builds,
and launch online virtual gaming worlds.
Stream your games on one
of the three supported game runtimes
and meet your price performance needs.

You don't have to modify
your game code either.

Just upload it, and we
take care of the rest.
You can also engage more players directly

with new distribution channels,
stream games or tutorials,
and create a storefront to reach players
with new and back catalog of titles.

Grow your audience today
with Amazon GameLift Streams.
(upbeat music)
